thread.title: BRIEF-Assured Guaranty Acquires Minority Interest In Rubicon Infrastructure Advisors

title: BRIEF-Assured Guaranty Acquires Minority Interest In Rubicon Infrastructure Advisors

organizations.name: brief-assured guaranty acquires minority interest in rubicon infrastructure advisors

text: February 27, 2018 / 4:34 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Assured Guaranty Acquires Minority Interest In Rubicon Infrastructure Advisors Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Assured Guaranty Ltd: * ASSURED GUARANTY ACQUIRES MINORITY INTEREST IN RUBICON INFRASTRUCTURE ADVISORS * ASSURED GUARANTY - UNIT ASSURED GUARANTY US HOLDINGS GOT A MINORITY INTEREST IN CADIA (MALTA) LIMITED, HOLDING CO OF RUBICON INFRASTRUCTURE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
